title: Miley Cyrus just said Liam Hemsworth is 'not a good person'
text:
From Cosmopolitan

Miley Cyrus just took a dig at her ex-husband Liam Hemsworth, commenting on an Instagram livestream that Cody Simpson 'is the only good person with a d*** that she knows'.

Miley and Liam announced their divorce after a decade together in the summer, with Miley going on to date Kaitlynn Carter and Cody Simpson, while Liam was spotted out with Maddison Brown.

Since Miley Cyrus and Liam Hemsworth announced their divorce in August, it's been all systems go. And while Miley's relationship with Kaitlynn Carter wasn't to be, she has since found love again with Cody Simpson - who she has been calling her boyfriend on Instagram Stories, and has reportedly moved in with her.

Liam Hemsworth, meanwhile, was spotted holding hands with Australian actress Maddison Brown, who reports claim he is keen on getting to know.

But if you thought that meant Miley and Liam were exes on good terms, you've got another thing coming, after the singer subtly said her ex-husband was not a good person during an Instagram live stream.

“Don’t give up, you don’t have to be gay, there are good dicks out there, you just have to find them”



“I always thought I had to be gay because all guys are evil but that’s not true”



- @MileyCyrus what's good? pic.twitter.com/y3yjUGpCSN







— • (@bljcmie) October 21, 2019

During a Q&A with fans over the weekend [20 August 2019], Miley told followers: "There are good men out there, guys, don't give up. You don't have to be gay, there are good people with d**ks out there, you've just got to find them. You've got to find a d**k that's not a d**k, you know.

"I always thought I had to be gay, because I thought all guys were evil, but it's not true. There are good people out there that just happen to have d**ks. I've only ever met one, and he's on this live."

The one man she's referring to is Cody Simpson, who pops up on the live stream. Fans are taking this to mean Miley thinks ex-husband Liam is not a good person, or is "evil". Wow.

The live stream comes as Cody's manager Matt Zeidman shed some light on how Miley and Cody's relationship is going. Speaking to People, he said, "It is early, but their friendship is long-standing and deeper than people realise. Though they originally met during their own wilder phases, they’re both sober now and are focused on health, work and spending time together. Seems pretty ideal to me."
